bio.summary: Engineering leader with 8+ years of experience delivering scalable customer support systems. Led a full-stack team, shipping the Help Center platform at LinkedIn, GPT-powered assistants, and CRM-integrated case management tools used by millions of users. Skilled in cross-functional leadership, hiring, coaching, and driving impact across product, design, and support operations.
description: As a leader I have managed and mentored a diverse team of full-stack engineers, supporting career development, code quality, and technical growth.
I have coached engineers through review cycles and performance improvement plans.

I have led the engineering for LinkedIn’s primary user support platform, impacting 1B+ users. This included, the Help Center, GPT powered assistants, real-time Live Chat integrations, intelligent routing, and personalized case flows to enhance self-service and case deflection.
I have directed a high-performing team of ICs while driving cross-functional initiatives in collaboration with PM, design, datascience, and CRM partners.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Delivered backend enhancements in Java and Scala to increase support tooling reliability and uptime
Designed intelligent case routing logic to personalize support workflows
Partnered with PM and CRM stakeholders to launch high-impact features, including AI-powered content summarization and semantic search to enhance user content delivery
Ensured operational excellence via on-call rotations, real-time monitoring, and fast incident resolution

experiences.title: Software Engineering Manager

Owned LinkedIn's Help Center and user support surface
Delivered offline webform flows, curated help content, and real-time Live Chat
Launched GPT-powered virtual assistants to enhance automation and reduce case volumes
Led cross-functional collaboration with product, design, data science, and CRM teams

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Built and scaled CRM integrations (Oracle, Salesforce, Dynamics)
Developed REST APIs and A/B tested backend performance
Interfaced APIs with different Line of Business services to deliver a more personalized support experience
Develop and executed plan to migrate externally hosted chat clients to an all-in-one in house chat solution
Worked cross-functionally to reduce support friction and improve response times

experiences.title: Software Engineer

Improved case creation UX and reduced latency
Enhanced content discoverability to increase user engagement

experiences.title: Tools Engineer

Built tools for workflows that integrated CRM data with member data for bug tracking using PHP, MySQL and AngularJS
Assisted in the migration of vanilla PHP code to Laravel Framework, and deployment pipelines using GitLab.
